original_text: just as you did partially understand us—that on the day of our Lord Jesus you will boast of us as we will boast of you.
korean_text: 너희가 우리를 부분적으로 알았으나 우리 주 예수의 날에는 너희가 우리의 자랑이 되고 우리가 너희의 자랑이 되는 그것이라

sentences.original_text: just as you did partially understand us
that on the day of our Lord Jesus
as we will boast of you
